cab.content: Military Secret. 1267 . From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for hidia, 22nd January .1920. (Received 24th.) 916. Malleson wires 19th January: "(1) Agent reported 4th January that garrison of Chardjui was 700 men with many machine guns. "(2) Between 1st January and 4th January, 3,000 dismounted and 1,700mounted men with 2/:heavy guns passed westward through Chardjui. " (3) Weather in Meshed is unusually mild, and Oxus still unfrozen."
